item.title: Why All Dental Practices Should Consider Social Media
item.description:
Why All Dental Practices Should Consider Social Media

Did you know that more than 70% of the UK population are on Facebook? Did you also know that of those 70% approximately 75% access it daily? So in other words most of the UK population over 13 are using it, and yet, just as with other forms of social media, many organisations and businesses question the value of it's use.

item.title: The Best Method To Improve Your Online Marketing Results - Re-Marketing
item.description:
The Best Method To Improve Your Online Marketing Results - Re-Marketing

Okay so in this week's video blog I am making something of a bold statement! I'm about to tell you about one of the most imp-active and successful methods you can use to dramatically change your online marketing success.

item.title: LinkedIn Marketing For Small Businesses
item.description:
LinkedIn Marketing For Small Businesses

When it comes to connecting with like-minded business people, there probably isn't a better medium than LinkedIn. You can be so very precise about who you interact with,based on location, job title, name, company - the list is endless. Yet many small businesses miss a trick with not being active and involved on it.

item.title: To Pay Or Not To Pay For Online Marketing
item.description:
To Pay Or Not To Pay For Online Marketing

One of the questions I regularly get asked is when should I “pay” for online marketing. When should I physically get out my credit card and pay for online marketing or can I essentially do it for free?
